text: (Those who believe) in Muhammad (pbuh) and in the Qur'an (and do good works) and perform acts of obedience between themselves and their Lord, (them verily We shall house in lofty dwellings of the Garden underneath which) beneath its trees and dwellings (rivers) rivers of wine, water, honey and milk (flow. There they will dwell secure) they will dwell therein forever. (How sweet the guerdon of the toilers) the reward of those who do good,
